ygData.subject: Re: IGL Mobilization
ygData.msgSnippet: Menasor turned around confused, at the sudden barrage of weaponfire. Menasor covered up from the attacks, as they charred his arms, and nocked him off

Subject: Re: IGL Mobilization
References: <27.189ac51e.288aa2a0@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Menasor turned around confused, at the sudden barrage of weaponfire.
Menasor covered up from the attacks, as they charred his arms, and
nocked him off ballance, but did little. He held up his arms, to fire
blasts of plasma, but the distabilizer shells smashed into him. "Menasor
under attack." Menasor reported, as he toppled backwards. He tried
desperatly to move, but his large frame was unable, as he hit the water
with a huge splash, and began to sink.
